channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Microsoft Entra at Ignite 2025: November 17-21
item.description: Microsoft Ignite is almost here. Join us from November 17–21, 2025, in San Francisco, California, and online for Microsoft’s largest event of the year. Ignite brings together IT and security professionals, developers, and business leaders from across the globe to explore the future of technology. This year, expect breakthrough insights on AI transformation and cutting-edge solutions to re-envision business flows, protect and govern AI, and simplify security. Plus, you’ll have countless opportunities to connect with peers, partners, and industry experts to grow your network and business. Regist...
